title: Russia Intensifies Assault on Ukraine's Fortress Belt

content.What happened: In late February 2026, Russian forces unleashed a concentrated artillery, missile, and drone bombardment on key eastern Ukrainian cities, including Kramatorsk and Kostyantynivka.
content.Why it matters: This aggressive battlefield air interdiction campaign signals the preparatory phase for a massive Spring-Summer 2026 ground offensive aimed at breaking the heavily fortified defensive backbone of Ukraine's Donetsk Oblast.
content.The big picture: As the war enters its fifth year, combined casualties are approaching 2 million. With recent US-mediated peace talks in Geneva stalling over security guarantees, both nations are locking into a protracted, high-intensity phase of attrition.
